QuestData.Title: The Road to Kun-Lai
QuestData.Description: Ah! Greetings friend of Lorewalker Cho. I have a message for you.$b$b<The strange little creature hands you a battered scroll case.>$b$bThe Lorewalker waits for you in Kun-Lai. Very dangerous to travel there, yes, very dangerous.$b$bLook for guides along the road to help you find your way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the Veiled Stair to Binan Village.
